text: Christopher de Lerisson Cazenove (17 December 1943 â€“ 7 April 2010) was an English actor. He was born in Winchester, Hampshire. He was known for his roles as Charlie Tyrell in The Duchess of Duke Street, David Rose in Eye of the Needle, Edward in Three Men and a Little Lady, John Thatcher in A Knight's Tale and as Ben in Dynasty.
